name: Right of Final Interpretation
title: Yanfei: Right of Final Interpretation
desc: "When it comes to cards... Well, anything is permissible, so long as the rules don't forbid it."
inPlayDescription: When Yanfei has this card equipped and uses a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Charged Attack: +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP. If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Scarlet Seal is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yanfei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Yanfei is your active character, equip this card.After Yanfei equips this card, she will immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Seal of Approval once.When Yanfei uses a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Charged Attack with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Scarlet Seal is triggered, then draw 1 card after the skill finishes calculating.(You must have Yanfei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
